name: priviblur
tagline: A self-hosted tool for blurring faces in media
description: PriviBlur is a self-hosted tool for face blurring in videos and images. It supports configurable filters and batch processing through a browser interface, designed to enhance privacy for shared media.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Apply blur effects to detected faces to protect privacy in shared media

features.title: Configurable Filters
features.description: Adjust blur intensity, detection sensitivity, and processing parameters

features.title: Video Support
features.description: Blur faces in video files frame-by-frame with optimized processing

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and process media through an intuitive web-based interface
